Hello!

My name is Md. Ahanaf Arif Khan. I also go by Eram.

I'm currently studying Computer Science and Engineering at University of Rajshahi, Bangladesh.

I like trying out new tech and my goal is to someday be able to contribute something in my sector.

This is my first time developing android apps using Android Studio.

I'm following a course on Udacity titled "Learn Android Development with Kotlin.

Let's See how far I can go with this.







Pancakes.
